title: How to buy a Chromebook this Black Friday
description: Black Friday is the best time to buy a Chromebook, and we're here to help you get the best device for your needs.

title: The latest Windows 11 update is causing stuttering for some gamers
description: There's another bug to report in the 22H2 update, and you might just have to sit tight until it gets fixed.

title: Amazon unveils its latest warehouse robot

title: It's official - open source software has never been more important

title: New Galaxy S23 Ultra leak compares camera quality with the Pixel 7 Pro
description: We have side-by-side shots supposedly captured by the Galaxy S23 Ultra, the Galaxy S22 Ultra, and the Pixel 7 Pro.
